alert.note: Alert for Gibson; Pike; Posey; Vanderburgh; Warrick (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 4:10PM EDT until June 29 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM CDT/445 PM EDT/ FOR EAST CENTRAL WHITE...SOUTHWESTERN WABASH... WARRICK...VANDERBURGH...GIBSON...POSEY AND PIKE COUNTIES... At 310 PM CDT/410 PM EDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Dale to near Darmstadt to near Grayville, moving southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Emergency management. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Evansville, Princeton, Mount Vernon, Boonville, Newburgh, Chandler, Fort Branch, Oakland City, Petersburg, Melody Hill, Haubstadt, Darmstadt, Owensville, Poseyville, Lynnville, Winslow, New Harmony, Cynthiana, Folsomville and Blairsville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 69 in Indiana between Mile Markers 1 and 52. Interstate 64 in Indiana between Mile Markers 2 and 53. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
